means: 破旧颠簸的交通工具（尤指自行车）

sentence.Network_en: That old bike without rubber tires was a real boneshaker.
sentence.Network_cn: 那辆没有橡皮轮胎的老式自行车骑起来真是颠簸地厉害.

means.word_mean: 1. any wheeled vehicle that is dilapidated and uncomfortable;
